alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Southampton; Suffolk; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 4:41AM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, periods of moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Virginia and northeast North Carolina. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Southampton; Suffolk; York
